===============
Getting Started
===============

Installation
------------

.. _PyPI: https://pypi.org/project/laspy/
.. _conda-forge: https://conda-forge.org/

To install `LSAPy` from `PyPI`_, you can use pip:

.. code-block:: shell

   pip install lsapy

In the future, `LSAPy` will be available on `conda-forge`_.
